text:
@politico #BernieForPresident #Covid_19 plan

-Emergency medical equipment 4 health workers
-Suspend mortgage
-Rent assistance
-NO utility shut off electric/cable/water/phone
-2k/month 4 all
-100% UI
-Expand SNAP/school lunch/meals 4 seniors
-every 1 has access to all needed medical care
